page.title: 10GOVERMENT
page.content: Lanark is part of {Strathclyde Region} and the area round Lanark itself is known as {Clydesdale District.} Regionally Lanark is represented by a Regional Councillor and at a local level by two District Councillors,who represent the north and south sides of Lanark.Presently the town of Lanark is represented by Walter Nisbett and May Hodgson,who are Independents and the latter of the two councillors is presently the convenor of the { {Clydesdale District} Council.The councillors regularly meet to advise the officials of {Clydesdale District} in the District Offices.An important local pressure group is the {Community {Council},which is made up of private individuals and representatives of the different interest groups. However the power of this body is somewhat limited.
